Package duke.task

Class TaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • duke.task.TaskManager
  • public class TaskManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the task manager for the duke program. The duke program has a task list as well as a schedule. The task manager provides abstraction to both components. This is also to help provide flexibility when more tasks list is added.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TaskManager()
      Constructs a new task manager to manage task list and schedule.
      TaskManager​(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> lines)
      Constructs a new task manager.

      • TaskManager

        public TaskManager()
        Constructs a new task manager to manage task list and schedule.

      • TaskManager

        public TaskManager​(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> lines)
        Constructs a new task manager. This stream of lines will be parsed by FileToTaskParser to each individual tasks that will be added individually to both the task list and the schedule.
        Parameters:
        lines - the stream of lines to be parsed.

      • getCurrentTaskListToSave

        public java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> getCurrentTaskListToSave()
        Returns a stream of string to be saved into the Storage. Each task is parsed using a task parser. See TaskToFileParser for more information.
        Returns:
        a stream of string to be saved into storage
